CodeBlockMethod.Name: OnMapEnter
CodeBlockMethod.Code: local item = _EntityService:GetEntitiesByTag("Item") for key, value in pairs(item) do value.Enable = true end

CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleTriggerEnterEvent
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code: -- Parameters local TriggerBodyEntity = event.TriggerBodyEntity -------------------------------------------------------- if TriggerBodyEntity.Id == _UserService.LocalPlayer.Id then self.Entity.Enable = false TriggerBodyEntity.DoubleJump.MyEnable = true end
